ygData.subject: Re: RL significant others & getting married or being with IG players
ygData.msgSnippet: I am married in real life and my husband plays EQ.  We have both RP d for many years, table top and online, and we understand that what is in game stays in
ygData.messageBody:
I am married in real life and my husband plays EQ. We have both RP'd for
many years, table top and online, and we understand that what is in game
stays in game. My Magician is engaged to a monk who, in real life, is in a
very long and committed relationship. They key is to trust each other. And,
for the record, though Mdian and Mysty RP an engagement there is no cyber
going on < chuckles >. The closest we come to that is laughing about it.

In Light,

The player behind Mystyrain

P.S. My husband's character also has an in game significant other and i
simply adore her! : )
